rows.label: xs12180100_MSG0001
rows.name: This is[ST:wide ]—[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs12180100_MSG0002
rows.name:
This isn't destruction from the recent battle[ST:wide ]—
It's damage from much earlier... from the time of the crash on Mira[ST:wide ]—[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs12180100_MSG0003
rows.name:
The damage is certainly severe.
Though we couldn't tell at all from the outside[ST:wide ]—[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs12180100_MSG0004
rows.name: Nagi, I am entering the database now.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs12180100_MSG0005
rows.name:
Be extremely careful.
It is the source of our lives, after all.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs12180100_MSG0006
rows.name: Roger.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs12180100_MSG0007
rows.name: Th-This is[ST:wide ]—[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs12180100_MSG0008
rows.name:
What is it, Elma?
Is something wrong with the database?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs12180100_MSG0009
rows.name: This... How can this be[ST:wide ]—[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs12180100_MSG0010
rows.name: Elma, report the situation.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs12180100_MSG0011
rows.name: Elma![ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs12180100_MSG0012
rows.name: Nagi[ST:wide ]— I will tell you only the facts.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs12180100_MSG0013
rows.name:
The database... the system where your consciousnesses
are supposed to be preserved[ST:wide ]—[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs12180100_MSG0014
rows.name: Was destroyed long ago[ST:wide ]—[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs12180100_MSG0015
rows.name: Destroyed, you say?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs12180100_MSG0016
rows.name:
What do you mean?
Explain it to me![ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs12180100_MSG0017
rows.name:
The database has ceased functioning.
It didn't just break yesterday or today.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs12180100_MSG0018
rows.name: It was already lost when we crashed on Mira![ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs12180100_MSG0019
rows.name: That's impossible![ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs12180100_MSG0020
rows.name:
Th-Then we[ST:wide ]—
What about us, standing right here[ST:wide ]—[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs12180100_MSG0021
rows.name: Exactly[ST:wide ]— Why are you all still functioning?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs12180100_MSG0022
rows.name:
Even though the system is destroyed[ST:wide ]—
Even though your consciousness and memories shouldn't exist[ST:wide ]—[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs12180100_MSG0023
rows.name: Is there something[ST:wide ]— about this planet[ST:wide ]—[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs12180100_MSG9000
rows.name: [ST:wide ]— Database Sector [ST:wide ]—[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs12180100_MSG9001
rows.name: This story is never ending...
